title: Biatah - John (Print)
description: Biatah translation of the Gospel of John. The Biatah language is spoken in the Malaysian state of Sarawak and the Indonesian province of West Kalimantan.

language.name: Biatah Bidayuh
language.area: Sarawak, 1st Division, Kuching District. 10 villages. Also in Indonesia (Kalimantan).
